mapper.select: SELECT WORD_ID, WORD_NM, ENG_NM, WORD_DC, SYNONM, B.USER_NM, DATE_FORMAT(FRST_REGIST_PNTTM,'%Y-%m-%d') FRST_REGIST_PNTTM, FRST_REGISTER_ID, DATE_FORMAT(LAST_UPDT_PNTTM,'%Y-%m-%d') LAST_UPDT_PNTTM, LAST_UPDUSR_ID FROM COMTNWORDDICARYINFO A, COMTNEMPLYRINFO B WHERE A.WORD_ID=#{wordId} and A.FRST_REGISTER_ID = B.ESNTL_ID

SELECT WORD_ID, WORD_NM, ENG_NM, WORD_DC, SYNONM, B.USER_NM, DATE_FORMAT(FRST_REGIST_PNTTM,'%Y-%m-%d') FRST_REGIST_PNTTM, FRST_REGISTER_ID, DATE_FORMAT(LAST_UPDT_PNTTM,'%Y-%m-%d') LAST_UPDT_PNTTM, LAST_UPDUSR_ID FROM COMTNWORDDICARYINFO A, COMTNEMPLYRINFO B WHERE 1=1 and A.FRST_REGISTER_ID = B.ESNTL_ID
AND WORD_NM LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchWrd}, '%')
AND ENG_NM LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchWrd}, '%')
ORDER BY WORD_ID DESC LIMIT #{recordCountPerPage} OFFSET #{firstIndex}

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM COMTNWORDDICARYINFO A, COMTNEMPLYRINFO B WHERE 1=1 and A.FRST_REGISTER_ID = B.ESNTL_ID
AND WORD_NM LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchWrd}, '%')
AND ENG_NM LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchWrd}, '%')
